title: New: Wy – You + I
body:
Malmo duo **Wy** have quickly become one of my favourite new artists of recent times.

Their unique take on heart-wrenching balladry is about as touchingly beautiful as it comes, as showcased on latest track, _You + I_. Penned about “being a couple when both of you struggle with social anxiety”, like with the rest of their releases, it wears it’s emotions on it’s sleeve, whilst feeling resoundingly confident. Check it out below.
